statements: SELECT * FROM interactive_quiz;
SELECT quiz_title, question_count FROM interactive_quiz WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT * FROM interactive_quiz ORDER BY quiz_id DESC;
SELECT quiz_title FROM interactive_quiz WHERE question_count < 10;
SELECT quiz_title, question_count FROM interactive_quiz WHERE quiz_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM interactive_quiz WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT quiz_title, question_count FROM interactive_quiz WHERE quiz_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM interactive_quiz WHERE question_count > 10 ORDER BY question_count DESC;
SELECT quiz_title, is_active FROM interactive_quiz WHERE question_count BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY quiz_title ASC;
SELECT COUNT(quiz_id) AS total_quizzes FROM interactive_quiz WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM quizzes;
SELECT quiz_name, question_count FROM quizzes ORDER BY quiz_id DESC;
SELECT quiz_id, quiz_name, question_count FROM quizzes WHERE question_count > 5;
SELECT q.quiz_id, q.quiz_name, COUNT(qs.question_id) AS question_count FROM quizzes q LEFT JOIN questions qs ON q.quiz_id = qs.quiz_id GROUP BY q.quiz_id;
SELECT DISTINCT quiz_name FROM quizzes;
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_id = 1;
SELECT quiz_name, question_count FROM quizzes WHERE question_count > 5;
SELECT q.question_text, q.correct_answer, q.quiz_id, c.quiz_name FROM questions q JOIN quizzes c ON q.quiz_id = c.quiz_id;
SELECT * FROM questions WHERE quiz_id IN (SELECT quiz_id FROM quizzes WHERE question_count < 10);
SELECT quiz_id, COUNT(*) AS question_count FROM questions GROUP BY quiz_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM quizzes;
SELECT quiz_name, topic, difficulty_level FROM quizzes WHERE difficulty_level > 3;
SELECT quiz_name, topic FROM quizzes WHERE topic='Math';
SELECT q.question_text, a.answer_text FROM questions q JOIN answers a ON q.question_id = a.question_id;
SELECT q.quiz_name, COUNT(q.quiz_id) AS num_questions FROM quizzes q JOIN questions qs ON q.quiz_id = qs.quiz_id GROUP BY q.quiz_id HAVING COUNT(q.quiz_id) > 5;
SELECT quiz_id, quiz_name, topic, difficulty_level FROM quizzes;
SELECT * FROM questions WHERE quiz_id = 1;
SELECT quiz_name, topic FROM quizzes WHERE difficulty_level > 2;
SELECT q.question_text, a.answer_text FROM questions q JOIN answers a ON q.question_id = a.question_id;
SELECT DISTINCT quiz_name, topic FROM quizzes WHERE difficulty_level < 3;
SELECT * FROM quizzes;
SELECT topic, difficulty_level FROM quizzes ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT question_id, question_text, points FROM questions WHERE points > 10;
SELECT quiz_id, student_id, score FROM quiz_results WHERE date_taken = '2022-01-15';
SELECT answer_text, is_correct FROM answers WHERE is_correct = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE difficulty_level > 2 ORDER BY topic DESC, total_questions ASC;
SELECT q.quiz_id, q.topic, COUNT(a.question_id) AS total_questions FROM quizzes q LEFT JOIN questions a ON q.quiz_id = a.quiz_id GROUP BY q.quiz_id, q.topic HAVING COUNT(a.question_id) > 5;
SELECT qr.quiz_id, qr.student_id, qr.score, q.topic, q.total_questions FROM quiz_results qr JOIN quizzes q ON qr.quiz_id = q.quiz_id WHERE qr.score >= 80 ORDER BY qr.score DESC;

SELECT q.topic, q.difficulty_level, COUNT(qr.result_id) AS total_attempts, AVG(qr.score) AS avg_score FROM quizzes q JOIN quiz_results qr ON q.quiz_id = qr.quiz_id GROUP BY q.topic, q.difficulty_level HAVING total_attempts > 10 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;

SELECT q.topic, q.total_questions, COUNT(DISTINCT qr.student_id) AS total_students FROM quizzes q LEFT JOIN quiz_results qr ON q.quiz_id = qr.quiz_id GROUP BY q.topic, q.total_questions ORDER BY total_students DESC, q.topic ASC;
SELECT * FROM Quizzes;
SELECT quiz_title, quiz_description FROM Quizzes WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, email FROM Users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT question_text, is_correct FROM Questions JOIN Answers ON Questions.question_id = Answers.question_id;
SELECT user_name, quiz_id, score FROM Users JOIN QuizResults ON Users.user_id = QuizResults.user_id WHERE score >= 80;
SELECT * FROM Quizzes;
SELECT quiz_title, created_at FROM Quizzes WHERE quiz_id = '123456';
SELECT user_name, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT qr.result_id, q.quiz_title, u.user_name, qr.score FROM QuizResults qr JOIN Quizzes q ON qr.quiz_id = q.quiz_id JOIN Users u ON qr.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT q.quiz_title, COUNT(qr.result_id) as total_results FROM Quizzes q LEFT JOIN QuizResults qr ON q.quiz_id = qr.quiz_id GROUP BY q.quiz_title ORDER BY total_results DESC;
